samOptiPro 0.1.0
  • Reference

Target-level diagnostics (time + optional step-size proxy)

Source: R/diagnostics.R
diagnostics_by_target.Rd

Builds a robust MCMC configuration, profiles per-sampler time with profile_sampler_times, maps samplers to their targets, and optionally computes a step-size proxy per target via proxy_step_sd if samples are provided.

diagnostics_by_target(
  build_fn,
  opts = samOptiPro_options(),
  niter = opts$time_profile_n,
  samples = NULL
)

Arguments

build_fn

A builder function returning list(model=, cmodel=, monitors=?).

opts

A list of options (e.g., from samOptiPro_options()).

niter

Integer; iterations for time profiling (defaults to opts$time_profile_n).

samples

Optional coda::mcmc.list used to compute the step proxy.

Value

A data.frame with columns target, type, time_s, step_sd.

Details

Note: uses a tolerant default monitor set followed by a robust configuration (no monitors= passed directly to configureMCMC).

Contents
